summary: Kirishima’s morning routine slowly become more streamlined over the course of his high school career- where he once spent hours...
caption:
Kirishima’s morning routine slowly become more streamlined over the course of his high school career- where he once spent hours styling his hair every day before class, he now only needs 15 minutes. Every morning after a quick workout and shower, he rakes product through his red locks and lies with his head hanging over the side of his bed. With the help from gravity, 3 minutes later after the product dries, he only needs to do touch-ups with a comb.

Decided to draw a headcannon that @blackbarbooks discussed on one of the recent streams. I will never pass up an opportunity to draw this precious boy <3

(i apologise for my horrible writing at the begging there hnng)

tags: Pretty please with sugar on top!
title: Beta Reader for BNHA Fanfic
body:
Please.
I really need a native english speaker as a beta reader.
I would prefer a permanent one, but know one for my current project would be enough.
I would rate it mature because of (domestic) violence. It’s a Fanfic about the Todoroki Theory.
Please help me reaching some ppl!

summary: I hate this so much (which is why I’m posting this later than I made it) T^T But hey, other people like it so I guess it’s not...
caption:
I hate this so much (which is why I’m posting this later than I made it) T^T But hey, other people like it so I guess it’s not too bad :’3

This is an idol AU (kinda) of Kurumi being Akali from K/DA! I really liked the video and how the neons were shown :3

I’ll try to do more things like this in the future~

tags: boku no hero academia x reader
summary: May I request a part 2 of that Aizawa reunites with civilian!Reader and newborn baby?
question: May I request a part 2 of that Aizawa reunites with civilian!Reader and newborn baby?
answer:
My apologies it took a while. I’m still not entirely confident of it. And also I just wanna share to my readers that obvis I havent been writing a lot for BNHA and actually ive been drifting from bnha. But dont worry i still love it so much! I’ve just been bingeing on Jojo’s bizarre adventures a lot lately and im tempted to start writing for them. Let me know if y'all are interested!!

RECAP

“Could you please repeat your statement?” the detective asked. “My name is (L/N) (Y/N), I don’t know who you are. But I do know that I am the guardian of Asahi (L/N) and have lived with the hero Dynasty for my entire life. We’re best friends, and she saved me and Asahi from getting attacked by the Hero" you’re voice suddenly went sour. “Eraserhead.” Aizawa’s eyes widened, “Is he here? Please make sure he doesn’t get Asahi. Please.” you begged, the detective gently put his hand on your shoulder as you pleaded. “Asahi is safe and getting checked up on. But (L/N), Dynasty is not your best friend. Or a hero, she’s a villain. She kidnapped you and Asahi for 3 months.” You shook your head “No that’s not true!” Tears started to form and suddenly the door opened. You’re wet eyes met with Aizawa’s dry eyes.

“You.”

“No, its him. Eraserhead!” You yelped in fear and stood up, pushing the chair back you stumbled. Aizawa took a step closer and more tears fell from your eyes, “Mr. Shota, please step back.” The detective stood and put his hand on Aizawa’s chest gently pushing him back. Aizawa stared the detective down and looked at you as you hid yourself in the corner. He quickly moved his head down, ashamed.

“Sir. Can you follow me?” the detective asked him and slowly Aizawa nodded. Following the detective out of the room and shutting the door behind them. “Sir, I know you really want to reconnect with (L/N) but they have a major case of amnesia and intense manipulation from Dynasty. This is from the hospital, its tips on how to help her get through the process.” Aizawa took the file and skimmed through the papers. Sighing the detective stood, “Dynasty is being contained. She will be investigated soon, you can join us if you’d like.” The Detective patted his shoulder and left the room. Nemuri slowly entered the investigation room, shota watched as Nemuri quietly comforted you. Sighing he sat down, knowing this would take a while. Nemuri slowly led you to the other seat, slouching in the hard seat. Nemuri left the room, leaving an intense tension between the two. “(Y/N)” Shota softly spoke and you cringed.

“What?” you said quietly and slowly straighten your back. Your eyes met and internally Aizawa smiled. “Asahi, is safe. He’s being taken care of at the children’s hospital.” He said this information and you sneered “He’s only safe because he’s away from you.” “Please (Y/N) just listen. Please.” He leaned forward in the seat and put his arms onto the table, “No you listen to me.” You argued back and stared him down. “I know Dynasty is a villian, but she saved me and Asahi. I owe her.” Your face showed grief as you spoke and Aizawa had a rush of guilt. “No you don’t owe her anything. Because she didn’t do anything for you. (Y/N) she kidnapped you and Asahi three months ago. From what I guess.” He stopped his words and looked at you in the eyes, tears were slowly forming in your eyes and he brought his hand to his face. Dragging it down he groaned.

“You’ve been manipulated to believe I’m your enemy.” He pulled his phone out and opened it up. Confused and angry you wiped tears away roughly and suddenly Aizawa pushed his phone in your face. “Look.” was all he had to say as you hesitantly took his phone. Slowly you swiped to look at more images. As he watched you swipe to more images he saw your face slowly form to an expression of grief and guilt. Getting to the 8th image, one of you and Aizawa. You were taking the image and had a wide smile on your face as Aizawa was asleep. You were holding a sharpie, cheekingly directing towards Aizawa who had a drawn on cat whiskers. “I” You looked at him and quickly tears poured down your cheeks. Sobbing you dropped his phone onto the table and dug your hands into your face. “I-I. I-I’m so sorry!” Quickly you felt arms wrap around you, looking up you felt Aizawa gently kiss your forehead. More sobs escaped you and you clutched his shirt tightly. “I’m so-so sorry Aizawa. I could’ve fought back! But they already had Asahi I-I!” You gasped as you felt him pull you in closer. “No, don’t say sorry. Its okay, I’m here. We’re together. You’re safe.” He whispered and played with your hair. Falling into his hand you quietly sobbed. “I love you.” He whispered and kissed your forehead again.

reblog.comment:
My apologies it took a while. I’m still not entirely confident of it. And also I just wanna share to my readers that obvis I havent been writing a lot for BNHA and actually ive been drifting from bnha. But dont worry i still love it so much! I’ve just been bingeing on Jojo’s bizarre adventures a lot lately and im tempted to start writing for them. Let me know if y'all are interested!!

“You’ve been manipulated to believe I’m your enemy.” He pulled his phone out and opened it up. Confused and angry you wiped tears away roughly and suddenly Aizawa pushed his phone in your face. “Look.” was all he had to say as you hesitantly took his phone. Slowly you swiped to look at more images. As he watched you swipe to more images he saw your face slowly form to an expression of grief and guilt. Getting to the 8th image, one of you and Aizawa. You were taking the image and had a wide smile on your face as Aizawa was asleep. You were holding a sharpie, cheekingly directing towards Aizawa who had a drawn on cat whiskers. “I” You looked at him and quickly tears poured down your cheeks. Sobbing you dropped his phone onto the table and dug your hands into your face. “I-I. I-I’m so sorry!” Quickly you felt arms wrap around you, looking up you felt Aizawa gently kiss your forehead. More sobs escaped you and you clutched his shirt tightly. “I’m so-so sorry Aizawa. I could’ve fought back! But they already had Asahi I-I!” You gasped as you felt him pull you in closer. “No, don’t say sorry. Its okay, I’m here. We’re together. You’re safe.” He whispered and played with your hair. Falling into his hand you quietly sobbed. “I love you.” He whispered and kissed your forehead again.

trail.content_raw:
My apologies it took a while. I’m still not entirely confident of it. And also I just wanna share to my readers that obvis I havent been writing a lot for BNHA and actually ive been drifting from bnha. But dont worry i still love it so much! I’ve just been bingeing on Jojo’s bizarre adventures a lot lately and im tempted to start writing for them. Let me know if y'all are interested!!

RECAP

“Could you please repeat your statement?” the detective asked. “My name is (L/N) (Y/N), I don’t know who you are. But I do know that I am the guardian of Asahi (L/N) and have lived with the hero Dynasty for my entire life. We’re best friends, and she saved me and Asahi from getting attacked by the Hero" you’re voice suddenly went sour. “Eraserhead.” Aizawa’s eyes widened, “Is he here? Please make sure he doesn’t get Asahi. Please.” you begged, the detective gently put his hand on your shoulder as you pleaded. “Asahi is safe and getting checked up on. But (L/N), Dynasty is not your best friend. Or a hero, she’s a villain. She kidnapped you and Asahi for 3 months.” You shook your head “No that’s not true!” Tears started to form and suddenly the door opened. You’re wet eyes met with Aizawa’s dry eyes.

“You.”

“No, its him. Eraserhead!” You yelped in fear and stood up, pushing the chair back you stumbled. Aizawa took a step closer and more tears fell from your eyes, “Mr. Shota, please step back.” The detective stood and put his hand on Aizawa’s chest gently pushing him back. Aizawa stared the detective down and looked at you as you hid yourself in the corner. He quickly moved his head down, ashamed.

“Sir. Can you follow me?” the detective asked him and slowly Aizawa nodded. Following the detective out of the room and shutting the door behind them. “Sir, I know you really want to reconnect with (L/N) but they have a major case of amnesia and intense manipulation from Dynasty. This is from the hospital, its tips on how to help her get through the process.” Aizawa took the file and skimmed through the papers. Sighing the detective stood, “Dynasty is being contained. She will be investigated soon, you can join us if you’d like.” The Detective patted his shoulder and left the room. Nemuri slowly entered the investigation room, shota watched as Nemuri quietly comforted you. Sighing he sat down, knowing this would take a while. Nemuri slowly led you to the other seat, slouching in the hard seat. Nemuri left the room, leaving an intense tension between the two. “(Y/N)” Shota softly spoke and you cringed.

“What?” you said quietly and slowly straighten your back. Your eyes met and internally Aizawa smiled. “Asahi, is safe. He’s being taken care of at the children’s hospital.” He said this information and you sneered “He’s only safe because he’s away from you.” “Please (Y/N) just listen. Please.” He leaned forward in the seat and put his arms onto the table, “No you listen to me.” You argued back and stared him down. “I know Dynasty is a villian, but she saved me and Asahi. I owe her.” Your face showed grief as you spoke and Aizawa had a rush of guilt. “No you don’t owe her anything. Because she didn’t do anything for you. (Y/N) she kidnapped you and Asahi three months ago. From what I guess.” He stopped his words and looked at you in the eyes, tears were slowly forming in your eyes and he brought his hand to his face. Dragging it down he groaned.

“You’ve been manipulated to believe I’m your enemy.” He pulled his phone out and opened it up. Confused and angry you wiped tears away roughly and suddenly Aizawa pushed his phone in your face. “Look.” was all he had to say as you hesitantly took his phone. Slowly you swiped to look at more images. As he watched you swipe to more images he saw your face slowly form to an expression of grief and guilt. Getting to the 8th image, one of you and Aizawa. You were taking the image and had a wide smile on your face as Aizawa was asleep. You were holding a sharpie, cheekingly directing towards Aizawa who had a drawn on cat whiskers. “I” You looked at him and quickly tears poured down your cheeks. Sobbing you dropped his phone onto the table and dug your hands into your face. “I-I. I-I’m so sorry!” Quickly you felt arms wrap around you, looking up you felt Aizawa gently kiss your forehead. More sobs escaped you and you clutched his shirt tightly. “I’m so-so sorry Aizawa. I could’ve fought back! But they already had Asahi I-I!” You gasped as you felt him pull you in closer. “No, don’t say sorry. Its okay, I’m here. We’re together. You’re safe.” He whispered and played with your hair. Falling into his hand you quietly sobbed. “I love you.” He whispered and kissed your forehead again.
